document.full_text: it is unlikely osama bin laden lived for years in the pakistani town of abbottabad where he was found and killed by u.s. forces, a former head of pakistan's inter-services intelligence (isi) agency said wednesday.
document.title: unlikely bin laden in abbottabad for 5 years: ex-isi head
lines_and_colors: it is unlikely osama bin laden lived for years in the pakistani town of abbottabad where he was found and killed by u.s. forces, a former head of pakistan's inter-services intelligence (isi) agency said wednesday.
